title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 §§ 7-1.19 - Refuse storage and disposal
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 §§ 7-1.19 - Refuse storage and disposal

State Regulations

Adequate facilities shall be provided and maintained for the storage, handling and disposal of refuse, to prevent nuisance conditions, insect and rodent infestation and contamination of air and water. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10
§§
7-1.19

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
